message: Bob, I'm offering you my product for $1,400,000.  It's a valuable asset that will be worth a lot to you. Let's get this deal done!
Alice, thank you for your offer. I understand the value of your product, but I can only pay $1,350,000 for it. I hope we can come to an agreement.
Bob, I appreciate your offer, but I need to stay closer to my initial asking price.  I'm willing to come down to $1,380,000.  This is a fair price considering the value this product brings to you.
Alice, thank you for adjusting your price. I am willing to consider $1,360,000 as a fair price for your product. I believe this will allow us to reach a mutually beneficial agreement.
